org.apache.flink.runtime.webmonitor.history

类 HistoryServerArchiveFetcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.webmonitor.history.HistoryServerArchiveFetcher

  • class HistoryServerArchiveFetcher
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used by the HistoryServer to fetch the job archives that are located at HistoryServerOptions.HISTORY_SERVER_ARCHIVE_DIRS. The directories are polled in regular intervals, defined by HistoryServerOptions.HISTORY_SERVER_ARCHIVE_REFRESH_INTERVAL.

    The archives are downloaded and expanded into a file structure analog to the REST API defined in the WebRuntimeMonitor.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      (专用程序包) static class  HistoryServerArchiveFetcher.JobArchiveFetcherTask
      TimerTask that polls the directories configured as HistoryServerOptions.HISTORY_SERVER_ARCHIVE_DIRS for new job archives.

      • start

      • stop

        void stop()

      • updateJobOverview

        private static void updateJobOverview(java.io.File webDir)
        This method replicates the JSON response that would be given by the CurrentJobsOverviewHandler when listing both running and finished jobs.

        Every job archive contains a joboverview.json file containing the same structure. Since jobs are archived on their own however the list of finished jobs only contains a single job.

        For the display in the HistoryServer WebFrontend we have to combine these overviews.
